p.s: The given sequence taken from the movie The Hate U Give or in short THUG, directed by George Tillmann Jr. and published in the year 2018.
It takes place right after Starr gives her interview on TVtelevision.
One can say it is more or less at the end of the middle of the movie.
The sequence starts with the Carter family having a happy dinner together.
They celebrate Starr, the main character, for having the courage to speak up, for her dead friend who was shot from the police, on live TVtelevision.
Shortly after King, the boss of a gang, makes his entrance.
Maverick, StarrsStarr's father, goes out to talk to him and ended up fighting him to protect his daughter Starr.
Two police manmen pull over to stop the fight.
They interrogated Maverick and pushed him on the glass.
This ended up with the family telling them to stop.
After they realised that Starr is the witness and left.
The sequence ended with the Carter family going back in the store.
